original_text: I scattered them among the nations, and they were dispersed through the countries. In accordance with their ways and their deeds I judged them.
korean_text: 그들을 그 행위대로 심판하여 각국에 흩으며 여러 나라에 헤쳤더니

sentences.original_text: I scattered them among the nations
and they were dispersed through the countries
In accordance with their ways and their deeds
